sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.default_value:
Create buzz for your brand

Guaranteed to increase automated online reviews by at least 15%.
  • BMS’s software can be configured to automatically prompt customers to review their in-store experience online
  • After they complete the 3-5 question BMS Survey, they’ll be asked “Would you also like to provide a review?”
  • They will then have the option to be texted or emailed an online review link from any social media platform.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.default_value:
Contact us today!

Become a reseller for a global leader in instant customer satisfaction measurement and reporting with A.I. powered, guaranteed satisfaction improvement. Our mission is to change the way companies collect and act on survey data. Join us!
  • All the tools and media you need to be successful
  • In-person training from industry experts.
  • Exclusive to reseller pricing.
Contact us at resellers@bigmouthsurvey.com today!
